DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Stimulation SPG high frequency ( 50-200Hz ) believe cause physiological parasympathetic block decrease VMCA oxyHb concentration cephalic vessel diameter . Stimulation SPG low frequency ( 1-60 Hz ) believe cause physiological parasympathetic upregulation increase VMCA , oxyHb concentration cephalic vessel diameter .
DOC.brief_title: Cephalic Vascular Recording Upon SPG Stimulation
DOC.criteria: •Subject currently enrol Pathway CH1 ( CIP001 ) •Subject NOT currently enrol Pathway CH1 ( CIP001 )
